    Company Confidential Vacancies Sales & Marketing Executive

    November 1, 2020

    TOC

    • Job Description
    • Company Overview
    • How To Apply

    Company Confidential is looking for new potential candidates to fill in for Sales & Marketing Executive position. If you currently looking for new education sector job opportunities and qualified with the job desc, feel free to apply this job.

    Job Description

    Position Summary
    The position focuses on driving student recruitment to the school through various sales channels and marketing events. This position works towards set KPI and targets and works closely with the Principal, Marketing and Admission teams.
    Job Responsibilities
    1. Initiate, execute and review sales and marketing activities and plans to drive student recruitment.
    2. To meet sales targets and KPI set by management.
    3. To generate sales and marketing reports.
    4. To lead enquiry management and timely follow-ups with potential leads to convert them into registered students.
    5. Forge good relationships with parents, students, local council and Ministry of Education.
    6. To conduct market intelligence and generate reports.
    7. To identify market potential and market development activities.
    8. To conduct surveys and customer satisfaction reviews.
    9. To provide feedback to the management on market sentiments and customer reviews.
    Candidate Requirement
    1. A Bachelor’s degree holder in any field.
    2. Work experience in the education industry is preferable. 
    3. An aggressive go-getter with a keen focus on KPI and targets.
    4. Independent, hands-on and an on-ground type of person.
    5. Pleasant personality, good communicator with great customer service skills.
    6. Able to communicate in English, Mandarin and Bahasa Malaysia fluently (written and spoken).
    7. Must be able to travel and possesses own transport.
    8. Able to work on weekends and long hours occasionally.

    Company Overview

    Our group of international schools are dedicated to provide exceptional education to students worldwide.
    We offer the Cambridge international curriculum and Fieldwork Education’s thematic learning (IEYC, IPC and IMYC). In addition, our bilingual education system to produce students who are fluent in both English and Mandarin - and have excellent HSK results to show.
    We equip our students with state-of-the-art facilities for all manners of learning especially coding, AI and robotics syllabus. We also have the JASS and Duke of Edinburgh Award programme in place to ensure students develop their interests as they grow to become valuable members of society.

    How To Apply

    If you confident and feel that this job is suitable to you, go ahead take your action now.
    Hope you find your dream education sector job in Johor.
    Apply Online
